input.sentences: grabbing a refreshing drink at the party .
nothing like a good belly laugh !
output.sentences: Grabbing a cold brew at the party at the dorm, after the exam was refreshing.
The food was really good and the company was provided by the sorority across the quad.
I found a pretty girl to sit next to and this photo shows that we are both all smiles, as a result.
Jenny farted and I laughed so hard my belly hurt.
We had all prepped hard for that exam, so you might say we partied equally hard to recover from it.
